product_name: Sierra Designs Hurricane Rain Jacket - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Lightweight and easy to pack, the wind- and waterproof Sierra Designs Hurricane Rain Jacket for women keeps you dry in sudden rain showers around town or in the backcountry. Ripstop nylon features a solvent-free, waterproof/breathable coating; polyurethane finish reduces interior condensation. Full, PVC-free seam taping ensures complete protection. Double stormflaps surround full-length front zipper; underarm zippers allow airflow as you warm up. Helmet-compatible hood. Drawcord hem and adjustable cuffs seal out the elements. Sierra Designs Hurricane Jacket includes a stuff sack for packing. Closeout.
short_description: Lightweight and easy to pack, the wind- and waterproof Sierra Designs Hurricane Rain Jacket for women keeps you dry in sudden rain showers around town or in the backcountry.
